| Retention period of records | Is the period for the retention of records related to the shelf life of the packaging and products it is designed to contain?  The site shall document its period of retention for records which relate to the usable life of the packaging and the products it is designed to contain, and shall respect any customer requirements. |  | 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
